channel.title: Crasher Problem
channel.description:
Ok so a few days ago I have started getting some craasher guy on my 508 Bulby source. All I get is "Connection received from (his ip)" like a hundred times until my server cashes, and then he does it again? How can I add his ip to bannedhosts.dat, because it doesnt seem to work, can someone show me an example of what I am supposed to do. It's just that the crasher hadn't made an account on my server 0.0
Thanks a lot, Cheeba

item.title: Crasher Problem
item.dc:creator: @rob_all_over rob all over
item.description:
@rob_all_over wrote:

some ppl are able to change there ip in like 3 mins and he probably has a cheat client which you can find something for when it gets a connection for one it blocks

Read full topic

item.title: Crasher Problem
item.dc:creator: @nathanrr44 nathanrr44
item.description:
@nathanrr44 wrote:

extream i get somthing similar but basically it says connection recieved which either means he loaded my client or attempted to login i only get it like every 5mins thou not 100s of times. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 06:48:56 pm[/size][hr]i even tried unbanning him to see if he logs in but nope.

Read full topic

item.title: Crasher Problem
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

You can’t really ban his ip, since he uses a different one (hard 2 explain… :S)

Also, I’m sure you can make it so that there can only be 1 connection per ip, theres a tut in it in the tutorial section. I think it might only be for 317s though. Also again, try not to use Bulby. It’s not so good.

Read full topic

Ok so a few days ago I have started getting some craasher guy on my 508 Bulby source. All I get is “Connection received from (his ip)” like a hundred times until my server cashes, and then he does it again? It’s just that the crasher hadn’t made an account on my server 0.0
